why: An android app to add friends based on a geographic region, and push notification on your social status
storyParas: Masters sem 3 Software Engg project, Social Me - Courtesy Dr. Mike Siok. Developed this one as an organic new idea with major contribution from Sushrut Diwan
Letting your friend circle know(except some pesky once) what's on your mind
Set a region as social region and when you come in vicinity of that region, your status is shared as a push notification to your circle. Add friends to let everyone know
Learnt/Used react native, with database on Firebase - including using out-of-box auth provided by firestore
Had fun learning React Native and programming for android(and css)
